title: Config
description: The schema for the config.json file

$schema.description: Just used to stop VSCode being angry

appOwnerUsername.description: The username of the bot owner

appOwnerId.description: The ID of the bot owner

database.description: Properties and options of the database (MySQL only) to use. See https://sequelize.org for more info

website.description: Properties and options for the website

url.description: The link to the bot's website

discordUrl.description: The link to the bot's support Discord server

dev.description: Properties and options for the development bot. These are not used in production. Used for testing and debugging purposes.

devServerId.description: The ID of the development server (where to register dev commands)

assetsDirectory.description: The directory thats stores assets. Interpreted relatively depending on the module that is reading it. CURRENTLY UNUSED

news.description: Properties and options for news sending.

endpoints.description: Properties and options for news endpoints.

relationChanges.description: Array of endpoints to send to when a relation between guilds changes.
